Articles.Content: I wanted to create a simple tutorial on launching craft to orbit. I hope it is helpful, and any feed back would be appreciated.

I have a couple of notes for you. Some of the text blocks go away a little too quickly for me (and I am a fast reader!). And (something I usually forget to do) clear out other flights or start a new save before making the run you're going to record, so the screen isn't cluttered with the tracks of previous flights.
The simplest I can think of is my old method of getting to orbit. Go up until you hit 70000-72000m, then go to apoapsis (might be periapsis), go sideways, and burn until you're in orbit
